Package com.zoho.arattai.ExtendedClasses

Class ImageClasses

java.lang.Object
com.zoho.arattai.MainClass.MessageClass
com.zoho.arattai.ExtendedClasses.ImageClasses
public class ImageClasses extends MessageClass
Represents an image message in the chat parser system. Extends MessageClass to add image-specific properties such as name, dimensions, size, and type.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Zoho Arattai

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageClasses

      public ImageClasses(String imageName, int imageHeight, int imageWidth, int imageSize, String imageType, String sender, Long timestamp, MessageType messageType)
      Constructs a new ImageClasses instance with the specified image properties and metadata.
      Parameters:
      imageName - the name of the image file
      imageHeight - the height of the image in pixels
      imageWidth - the width of the image in pixels
      imageSize - the size of the image file in bytes
      imageType - the type/format of the image file
      sender - the sender of the image message
      timestamp - the timestamp when the image was sent
      messageType - the type of the message (should be IMAGE)

      Returns:

    • getImageMessageType

      public MessageType getImageMessageType()

      Returns:

    • getImageAll

      public String getImageAll()
      Returns all image message information as a formatted string.
      Returns:
      a string containing all image properties including sender, timestamp, name, dimensions, size, and type

    • getImageResolution

      public String getImageResolution()
      Gets the resolution of the image as a formatted string.
      Returns:
      the image resolution in format "heightxwidth" (e.g., "1920x1080")
